text: Biryani or your favourite MAGGI Masala Noodles? Now you don't have to choose. This epic MAGGI Noodles Biryani Recipe combines your favourite 2-Minute Masala Noodles with a Biryani twist. Packed with lots of vegetables and aromatic spices, this easy and delicious meal will be a hit with the whole family. It can be served at home for everyday cooking or for special occasions like holidays and celebrations.
